name: Ai-Thinker-RD-03
description: Arduino library for the Ai-Thinker RD-03 24Ghz FMCW radar sensor. This sensor is a Frequency Modulated Continuous Wave radar, which makes it good for presence detection and its sensitivity at different ranges of moving targets can be configured.
keywords: radar, fmcw, presence, detection, sensor, ai-thinker, rd-03
